title: Bella Vista Coming home never felt so good!
posting_body: ['Welcome To The Best of TacomaBella Vista is\xa0a distinctive, hillside community in\xa0Tacoma.', 'Enjoy the privacy of our retreat-like property as well as the convenience of easy access to the freeway and major shopping areas.', 'Our one- and two-bedroom floor plans have all the amenities you deserve, including full-size washers and dryers and private patios or decks, many with incredible mountain and city views.', "As a resident you can relax on the sun deck with views of Mt. Rainier, work out in the fitness center and spend time with friends\xa0in the\xa0residents' lounge with free WiFi.", '\xa0A great location and\xa0beautiful mountain views make Bella Vista a perfect place to live.', '-Close To Major Employers Including Joint Base Lewis-McChord', '-24-Hour Service Line', '-Sun Deck w/BBQ & Mt. Rainier Views', '-Full Size Washer/Dryer', '-Playground', '-Ceiling Fan', '-Resident Lounge w/WIFI', '-Patio/Balcony With Storage', '-Breakfast Bar', '-Dedicated Dining Room', '-Mountain & City Views', '-Wood-burning Fireplaces', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'For more information please visit', '<URL>']
